folder: Plaza Street & Vanderbilt Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
1. Plaza Street, from Flatbush to Vanderbilt Avenues, showing the Brooklyn Riding and Driving Club. The building in the foreground is now used as a commercial garage. August 2, 1928.

2. The same, showing also Flatbush Avenue, east side, north of Plaza Street. August 2, 1928.

3. The same, showing the Vanderbilt Avenue, side of the Brooklyn Riding and Driving Club. August 2, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
